abstract: Mauricio Aníbal Isla Isla (born 12 June 1988) is a Chilean footballer who plays for Serie A club Juventus and for the Chilean national team. He plays mainly as a right wing-back but he can also play in numerous other positions, including as a right full-back, right winger or centre midfielder.
